page_content:
Convolutional Layer (cont.)
• Volume Size W1×H1×D1
• Four Hyperparameters:
• Number of filters K
• Filter size F
• Stride S
• Zero Padding P
• Output volume size W2×H2×D2
• W2= [(W1−F+2P)/S]+1
• H2= [(H1−F+2P)/S]+1
• D2=K
• Number of parameter : F⋅F⋅D1 weights per filter , total = (F⋅F⋅D1)⋅K + K (for bias).
